summary: This is an email chain from November 13, 2021, forwarding a news alert about Ghislaine Maxwell giving her first interview from prison to the Daily Mail. The email expresses surprise that a reporter obtained access to her.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: She is the subject of the forwarded news article, having given her first interview from behind bars to the Daily Mail.

events.title: Daily Mail publishes Maxwell prison interview
events.description: The Daily Mail publishes an article containing Ghislaine Maxwell's first interview from prison.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell gave her first interview from prison in November 2021.
The interview was obtained and published by the Daily Mail (Mail on Sunday).
The email chain shows internal communication reacting to the news of the interview being published.
